Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to providing telephone service to inmates at no cost
Summary: Requires the department of corrections and community supervision to provide telephone services to individuals within the custody of the department in correctional facilities at no cost to the individuals or the receiving parties for domestic telephone calls.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to providing telephone service to inmates at no cost
